name: Counter Helicopter Fury Mission 2017
description:
In Counter Heli Strike Mission game, you are a special elite force commando ready to fight against deadly enemy soldiers. Several terrorists have attacked civilians and your mission is to counter that threat. While having the support from helicopter, you have to play your part in counter terrorist squad and prove your military skills in assassin missions. With the support special sniper rifles with unlimited bullets, you will rely on your shooting skills to perform that job.

This is the world’s most powerful combat ever and you have to play your role as you are the lone commando in the battle field. Grab your sniper and shoot precisely.

The ultimate realistic shooter game with 10 action packed levels in each of which there are terrorists of different qualities.

Features:

- Superb sniper controls
- Stunning view from the helicopter
- Realistic bullet effects
- Thrilling sound effects
- Variety of weapons and soldiers
- 10 Realistic missions
